item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: TLDR: We do use cookies to track site usage but we do not collect any personal data. Website visitors # No personal information is collected. No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties. No information is shared with advertising companies. No information is monetized. Information we collect and what we use it for # Video content of the lecture parts is accessible only if you’re logged in through your Github account.
